title: Spiritual Healing: This Book Includes: Ayurveda and Reiki Healing Meditation Essentials For Beginners (2 in 1)
author: Kamala Gandhi
description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. If you are looking to improve your health and quality of life without expensive doctors and medicine, by practicing millenary techniques, then you have chosen the perfect audiobook. Ayurveda: Hindu Healing and a Secret for a Better; and Reiki Healing Med...

But so many people have their chakras blocked and unbalanced in the modern world, and are unable to benefit from their spiritual and physical healing powers. Now, this book uncovers the secrets of the seven chakras, and how we can unlock them. By: [Nazzario Da Lima](/search?searchAuthor=Nazzario+Da+Lima&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=FVCKZS13NZKG4TQQ4N9G&pageLoadId=S2wD7RtGW5jFAuHO&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Meditation for Beginners - This Book Includes - Practical Meditation for Beginners + Reiki Healing for Beginners + Chakra Healing for Beginners - By: Crystal Jessica Aurelius - Narrated by: Elizabeth Wilson - Length: 10 hrs and 50 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Are you skeptical of the power of meditation to change your life? In 2011, Harvard researchers conducted a study on meditation and found that, in addition to boosting the overall well-being of the users, meditation also helped boost focus and reduced age-related cognitive decline. This bundle contains: Practical Meditation for Beginners - Mind Hacking to 21 Days of Highly Effective Guided Meditations to Improve Your Life, Your Energy, Balance and Healing of Your Body; Chakra Healing for Beginners; and Reiki Healing for Beginners. - - This audible brought awesome achievements. - By Oscar on 11-11-19 - Chakras for Beginners - The Complete Guide to Balance Chakras and Healing Yourself with Meditation for Starters, Practical Exercises to Open the Third Eye - By: Kristine Aurelius - Narrated by: Casey Yarrow - Length: 3 hrs and 35 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story There has been a lot of talk about auric energies lately, with people loosely using phrases like "avoid negative energies" as part of self-development process. You've probably used the term and other related ones, but do you know what they refer to? This audiobook seeks to cover the ins and outs of chakras, with beginner-friendly explanations that will enable you to start applying what you learn immediately. - - Such An Important Audio Book! - By Gabriel Davila on 01-29-20 - - Length: 3 hrs and 21 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Are you looking to study chakras, but don't know where to start? If so - keep reading! A chakra is a key point in the body, with high potential to change and improve your physical and mental health. The 7 chakras are actually a map for improving your quality of life in any layer you can think of. In this outstanding audiobook, you will be taken on a journey to the hidden energy centers of the body, and learn how to use them to enjoy a long, happy, healthy and distressed life! You will learn how to open, activate, and awaken your Third Eye Chakra. - - Awaken and balance your chakras - By rhonarrhonatgmaildotcom on 09-17-17 By: [Sarah Rowland](/author/Sarah-Rowland/B06X9J7SBL?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=FVCKZS13NZKG4TQQ4N9G&pageLoadId=S2wD7RtGW5jFAuHO&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) Publisher's summary If you are looking to improve your health and quality of life without expensive doctors and medicine, by practicing millenary techniques, then you have chosen the perfect audiobook. Ayurveda: Hindu Healing and a Secret for a Better; and Reiki Healing Meditation Essential for Beginners a comprehensive guide to spiritual healing that will help you unlock millenary secrets to improve your health, body, and state of mind by teaching you the simple Hindu healing techniques of Ayurveda and Reiki. You will learn: - How to understand your body, and determine your constitution - How the process of disease works - How to liberate your emotions - How to cure yourself using the Pancha Karma - How to plan an ayurvedic diet for a better life - How Ayurveda can change your life through small modifications in lifestyle and routine. - The practice of yoga - How to meditate for a longer life - How to apply natural medicine as first aid and treatment - How to understand energy and chakras about your Ki and body's alchemy. - How to understand the The universal spiritual laws and how they interact with energy healing - How Reiju and the levels of reiki work and the gassho meditation - How to use the Koriki or ancient symbols - How to conduct a Reiki Session - Different tricks and variations of Reiki treatments PLEASE NOTE: When you purchase this title, the accompanying PDF will be available in your Audible Library along with the audio. What listeners say about Spiritual Healing: This Book Includes: Ayurveda and Reiki Healing Meditation Essentials For Beginners (2 in 1)Average customer ratings Reviews - Please select the tabs below to change the source of reviews. - Overall - Performance - Story - [TC pet mom](/listener/amzn1.account.AFBJ66YLCZC7DPU6ZISWRCWBQM4A?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_0&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=FVCKZS13NZKG4TQQ4N9G&pageLoadId=S2wD7RtGW5jFAuHO&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 08-15-19 Whew, glad it's over! First of all I hate to give any book a bad review. I would sincerely recommend not listening to it on Audible but instead purchasing the book if you are interested in getting every single fact and detail. Related to this topic - How to Release Anxiety - By: Gabrielle Bernstein - Narrated by: Gabrielle Bernstein - Length: 1 hr and 29 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story It's not just you. Stress levels are at an all-time high—so much so that a recently convened panel of medical experts in the US has recommended that all adults under the age of 65 be screened for anxiety. In How to Release Anxiety, Gabby Bernstein offers simple, actionable steps for feeling better, living with more ease, and showing up for those around us. Gabby's unusual advice: Rather than manage your anxiety, what if you befriended it? Gabby posits that what we befriend, we can ultimately be at ease with. Greene - Narrated by: Dr. Ross W. Greene - Length: 2 hrs and 38 mins - Abridged - Overall - Performance - Story Dr. Ross Greene, a distinguished clinician and pioneer in the treatment of kids with social, emotional, and behavioral challenges, has worked with thousands of explosive children, and he has good news: these kids aren't attentionseeking, manipulative, or unmotivated, and their parents aren't passive, permissive disciplinarians. Rather, explosive kids are lacking some crucial skills in the domains of flexibility/adaptability, frustration tolerance, and problem solving, and they require a different approach. - - I started to cry....and this Dad doesn't do that - By Jj on 02-26-15 - Cape Cod National Seashore - By: Gordon Hempton - Length: 54 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Unlike canned nature sounds created in a studio, renowned acoustic ecologist Gordon Hempton travels the world recording remarkable locations that capture the essence of the place itself.
